description.value: Once per session, the explorer can spend a Fate Point and gain the benefits of a Talent an ally possess, or grant the benefits of a Talent they possess to an ally. Neither the ally nor the character must meet any requirements the Talent possesses. This effect persists until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: Once per session, the explorer can spend a Fate Point and gain the benefits of a Talent an ally possess, or grant the benefits of a Talent they possess to an ally. Neither the ally nor the character must meet any requirements the Talent possesses. This effect persists until the end of the encounter.
